column4: Tesla becomes most valuable U.S. car maker  edges out GM
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  April 10 Tesla Inc on Monday briefly became the most valuable U.S. car maker  reaching a market capitalization of as much as $51.105 billion  higher than General Motors's.

column4: BRIEF-NXP Semiconductors NV says will not hold an earnings call
column5: * NXP Semiconductors NV - will not hold an earnings call nor provide forward guidance for Q2 of 2017 due to pending acquisition of NXP by Qualcomm Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
